title: Potion

properties.value: A potion is given to a player by asking the Apothecary in Varrock for a free sample. The Apothecary will give it roughly half the time, otherwise refusing to do so. Multiple potions can be obtained using the drop trick.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Acne potion
This article is about the free potion that players can obtain from the Apothecary in Varrock. For potions created using the Herblore skill, see Herblore.
Not to be confused with Potion (Watchtower).
Potion
Released4 January 2001 (Update)

Advanced data
Item ID195

A potion is given to a player by asking the Apothecary in Varrock for a free sample. The Apothecary will give it roughly half the time, otherwise refusing to do so. Multiple potions can be obtained using the drop trick.

The Apothecary indicates that the potion is a spot cream. If used on various citizens in Sophanem, it is revealed that the potion is used to relieve itching.

This item cannot be traded on the Grand Exchange.

Uses[edit | edit source]

This potion has only a few uses:

  • It is a possible item requirement for the Forgettable Tale of a Drunken Dwarf quest.
  • It can be used on the civilians of Sophanem who are covered in spots, which results in various amusing conversations. Citizens with different dialogues are as follows: Priests, Slaves, the Embalmer, Siamun and Raetul (shared with Carpenter).

Item sources[edit | edit source]

For an exhaustive list of all known sources for this item, see here (include RDT).
SourceLevelQuantityRarity
Imp2; 7 11/128
Reward Chest (The Gauntlet)N/A 1Common

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Before Varrock was updated, the potion was available by way of an item spawn in the Apothecary's shop.

[[File:Potion detail.png|left|130x200px]]
A '''potion''' is given to a player by asking the [[Apothecary]] in [[Varrock]] for a free sample. The Apothecary will give it roughly half the time, otherwise refusing to do so. Multiple potions can be obtained using the [[drop trick]].

The Apothecary indicates that the potion is a spot cream. If used on various citizens in [[Sophanem]], it is revealed that the potion is used to relieve itching.

This item cannot be traded on the [[Grand Exchange]].

==Uses==
This potion has only a few uses:
* It is a possible item requirement for the [[Forgettable Tale of a Drunken Dwarf]] [[quest]].
* It can be used on the civilians of [[Sophanem]] who are covered in spots, which results in various amusing conversations. Citizens with different dialogues are as follows: [[Priest (Sophanem)|Priests]], [[Slave (Sophanem)|Slaves]], the [[Embalmer]], [[Siamun]] and [[Raetul]] (shared with [[Carpenter]]).

==Item sources==
{{Drop sources|Potion}}

==Trivia==
*Before Varrock was updated, the potion was available by way of an item spawn in the Apothecary's shop.
